user_profile.name: Mabel Johnson
user_profile.description: Mabel is a lively 68-year-old woman with a passion for socializing, often enjoying coffee with friends at local cafes. Though she is a novice with technology, her outgoing personality drives her to adapt quickly and tackle tasks, like scheduling a much-needed doctor visit, even under pressure. Currently experiencing some health concerns, she is very motivated to ensure she receives timely care despite feeling a mix of urgency and impatience.

instructions.dialogue: Be brief and direct, give minimal information.
instructions.profile: Only share profile information when specifically asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express minimal emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

priority_features: Availability of doctors in close proximity
usage_scenarios: Needing to schedule an appointment quickly due to a health concern
Wanting to find a doctor with the shortest waiting time
Looking for help in remembering the appointment date and time
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Online platforms or local clinic phone numbers
additional_requirements: Assistance in navigating online booking systems
Clear instructions on what to bring to the appointment
Support in confirming insurance coverage beforehand
